text: Bootstrap provides different styles of buttons: These styles can be applied to <a>, <button>, <input type="button"> and <input type="submit"> To achieve the button styles above, Bootstrap has the following classes: e .btn e _.btn-default e _.btn-primary e .btn-success e _.btn-info e _.btn-warning e _.btn-danger The classes that define the different sizes are: e .btn-link . R e _.btn-md e _.btn-sm e .btn-xs
